problem_text_cn: 如图,PA、PB是半径为1的⊙O的两条切线,点A、B分别为切点,∠APB=60°,OP与弦AB交于点C,与⊙O交于点D．则图中阴影部分的面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are two tangents of ⊙O with radius N_0, points A and B are tangent points respectively, ∠APB = N_1, OP intersects chord AB at point C, and intersects ⊙O at point D. Then the area of ​​the shaded part in the figure is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵PA、PB是半径为1的⊙O的两条切线,∴OA⊥PA,OB⊥PB,OP平分∠APB,而∠APB=60°,∴∠APO=30°,∠POA=90°-30°=60°,又∵OP垂直平分AB,∴△AOC≌△BOC,∴S~△AOC~=S~△BOC~,∴S~阴影部分~=S~扇形OAD~=\frac{60π×1^{2}}{360}=\frac{π}{6}．故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查了扇形的面积公式:S=\frac{nπR^{2}}{360},其中n为扇形的圆心角的度数,R为圆的半径),或S=\frac{1}{2}lR,l为扇形的弧长,R为半径．也考查了切线的性质．
